messages.content: In first part of episode Homer the Heretic, Homer home alone and he is do a routine, like bathing, eating, dancing. Can you give me list of films like first part of this episode with same atmosphere.

Yes, here are some movies that have a similar atmosphere to the first part of "Homer the Heretic":

1. Ferris Bueller's Day Off (1986)
2. Home Alone (1990)
3. The Breakfast Club (1985)
4. Risky Business (1983)
5. Weekend at Bernie's (1989)
6. Office Space (1999)
7. Sixteen Candles (1984)
8. Dazed and Confused (1993)
9. Fast Times at Ridgemont High (1982)
10. The Big Lebowski (1998)

These movies all have a light-hearted, comedic tone and feature characters going about their daily routines in humorous ways.
